content.text: Good morning! What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time outside, I do some gardening and I also like to go for walks.
That sounds nice! I have a cat named Jasper. What about you, do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets. But I've always wanted a dog.
Dogs are great companions, I love playing with my dog. What do you do for work?
I work as a grill cook at a local restaurant. It's a lot of fun, I get to meet a lot of different people.
That sounds like a fun job, I'm sure you meet some interesting characters. I work at a doctor's office, it can be pretty hectic sometimes but I like my job.
I'm sure it's important work, keeping people healthy.
It is, I'm glad I can help people. I have kids, what about you?
I have two kids, they're both in school.
That's great, I'm sure they keep you busy. What did you do last weekend?
I spent some time with my kids and my friends. We went to the park and had a picnic.
That sounds like a fun time, I'm glad you had a good weekend.
